titles: The modest cavallieres advice together with a letter to the inhabitants of the Isle of Wight where His Sacred Majesty is now remaining.
author: C. G. (Charles Gerbier)
notes: Attributed to Gerbier by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
